Work History

  • 2010

    ABB Inc.

    Project Manager | Equipment | Manufacture

    (2010 - Present) | St. Louis, MO

    Internal procedure compliance and processes improvement for increased customer satisfaction. Directed client kick-off meetings resulting in defined deliverables and established acceptance criteria. Coordinated and managed meetings with tactical team, functional managers and stakeholders. Created positive spirit of collaboration during the project executions. Provided alignment and direction to team members through reporting and action item updates. Maintained project schedules with critical-path execution strategy for on-time projects. Approved and monitored equipment vendor contracts for timely and under budget delivery. Facilitated start-up meetings with engineering and operations for scope validation, schedule release and thorough understanding of the contract deliverables. Issued RACI charts to ensuring clarity to team members on responsibilities and assignments. Participated in safety observation tours in compliance with the health and safety plan. Performed reverse engineering of high temperature gasket for furnace transformers. Developed a user-friendly application suitable for order entry management.

  • 2007

    ABB Inc.

    Strategic Marketing Manager | Project Manager | Customer Training Program PM

    (2007 - 2010) | St. Louis, MO

    Monitored, evaluated and reported on the performance of eight business units. Maintained business units marketing applications reporting monthly revenue to top executives. Acted as PM for a customer training program.

  • 2003

    ABB Inc.

    Marketing Technical Support | Sales Coordinator

    (2003 - 2007) | St. Louis, MO

    Instituted, simplified and standardized the order management system in 11 domestic & overseas business units. Coordinated sales efforts of two European factories in the Mexican Market. Provided field technical support to a South American factory during its first U.S. installation. Avoided back-charges by decisively resolving on-site claims. Prepared SWOT analysis for various factories. Coordinated and supported European factory sales efforts in the Mexican market with EPC companies. Managed data and participated in sales forecast for American and Canadian manufacturing plants.

  • 2002

    ABB Inc.

    Marketing Analyst | Database Manager

    (2002 - 2003) | St. Louis, MO

    Prepared marketing presentations and reports. Administered an internal order booking system for local and overseas plants for small, medium and large power transformers. Responsible for data integrity and completeness for the marketing database. Issued internal marketing reports using data-mining concept.

  • 2002

    ABB Inc.

    Sales Engineer | Business Segment Liaison

    (2002 - 2003) | St. Louis, MO

    Coordinated five power transformers manufacturing plants from overseas. Reached record sales in "Small Power".

  • 1991

    IEM SA de CV

    Design and Development Manager

    (1991 - 1998) | Tlalnepantla Area, Mexico

    Responsible for maintaining and updating applications for power transformer design in Fortran. Designed and supervised the construction of a multiple position bench for electrical motor testing. Recompiled transformers’ design programs from mainframe computer to workstation. Achieved considerable savings by replacing high-cost operating system.
